title: Whitelisting to Protect Critical Infrastructure
extract: Whitelisting. Protection of critical infrastructure computer systems from malware and zero-day exploits is imperative because critical systems provide for the well-being of the public by supplying valuable public resources, such as water, gas, and electricity.
extract_html: Whitelisting. Protection of critical infrastructure computer systems from malware and zero-day exploits is imperative because critical systems provide for the well-being of the public by supplying valuable public resources, such as water, gas, and electricity.
